participant_1.name: Morgan
participant_1.personality: Passionate and sensitive, Morgan has a strong commitment to animal rights and often feels deeply about the world around her.
participant_1.background: i am an animal activist. the holidays make me depressed. my age is too old to say. i have rainbow hair. i spend my time bird watching with my cats.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Practical and hands-on, Alex enjoys working with his hands and has a strong connection to nature, though he struggles with some fears from his past.
participant_2.background: i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma.

content.text: i am sorry , i am sorry , i am sorry , i am sorry , you are still young , you are not
i love animals , they are so adorable , and i am a cat person , and you ?
that's cool , i am a teacher , and i am a teacher , and you ?
